{{Wireless embedded system |brand=NAG |model=SNR-CPE |revision=-W4N (rev.M) |asin= |series=N300 |image1= |est_release_date=05/2017 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=LB-LINK |manuf_model=BL-RM7620N |manuf_rev=V1.2 |availability=now |type=wireless router, CPE, |fcc_id= |pcb_id=BL-RM7620N-V1.2 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620N |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model=SPI |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M13S5121632A-5T |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, J2 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620N |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux;3.4.113;Wive-NG-MT; |tp_firmware=Wive-NG |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Wive-NG-MT |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=Admin |default_pass=Admin |oui=F8:F0:82 |oui_eth=F8:F0:82 }} {{TagLine|N300 Wireless Router}} :[https://shop.nag.ru/catalog/00009.Besprovodnoe-oborudovanie/05935.Wifi-routery-SNR/16058.SNR-CPE-W4N-revM#tech Product page]
Future support available with {{TPFirmware|Wive-NG}} :[https://wi-cat.ru/wive-ng/about-wive-ng-mt/ ''Wive-NG-MT'' on '''Wi-CAT'''] (RU) The bootloader used is assumed to be '''U-Boot'''. :Default SSIDs Wive-NG-MT.
===Forum threads=== *[https://4pda.ru/forum/index.php?showtopic=882086 On '''4pda''' forums] ([https://cs5-1.4pda.to/12284725/20180226_114015.jpg PCB image]) *[http://www.right.com.cn/forum/thread-307241-1-1.html On '''Right''' forums] (CN) (PCB image) :OEM: [https://lblink.1688.com/offer/41534698290.html LB-LINK BL-RM7620N V1.2]
===See also=== :[[List of Wive-ng firmware supported devices]] *[[NAG SNR-CPE-ME1]] - AC750 Wireless Router *[[NAG SNR-CPE-MD1]] - AC750 Wireless Router *[[NAG SNR-CPE-W2N]] - N300 Wireless Router *[[NAG SNR-CPE-W4N (rev.M)]] - N300 Wireless Router
